title: Single authority to control cities; UDA axe to also fall on Dehiwala-Mt Lavinia, Kotte and Kolonnawa municipalities
content: The Nation – By Gagani Weerakoon Giving a new twist to the much speculated decision to convert the Colombo Municipal Council to an authority, Defence Secretary Gotabhaya Rajapaksa signalled this week that such an authority is not only for Colombo but will include Dehiwala-Mt.Lavinia, Kotte and Kolonnawa.
